title: Need to know how to connect to my wifi I've tried everything.iveven factory reset phone still sayin
content: It's my brand new LG phone I had service for a month then I can't afford any more at the moment. So I use my wifi until two days ago it will  no longer connect to the 2g wifi. Just says saved. I've done it all reset settings factory reset phone u name it I did it and still won't connect.
